snippet: Residents say the spate of violence has happened outside or on the margins of Prospect-Lefferts Gardens, not within its historic district of single-family homes.
abstract: Most Prospect-Lefferts Gardens residents are unruffled by recent shootings because episodes happened outside or on the margins of the neighborhood and not within the historic district of single-family homes.

byline.original: By JOSEPH BERGER and J. DAVID GOODMAN

lead_paragraph: Residents say the spate of violence has happened outside or on the margins of Prospect-Lefferts Gardens, not within its historic district of single-family homes.

headline.seo: Prospect-Lefferts Gardens Unruffled by Nearby Shootings
headline.main: Nearby Shootings Don’t Ruffle a Stately Brooklyn Neighborhood
headline.print_headline: Nearby Shootings Don’t Ruffle a Stately Brooklyn Neighborhood
